name: Runouw - Somber+Aero
description: Merged Shad's (Sykotec's) two Runouw themes into one and tweaked a few things. Darkens pretty much everything and generally makes the site look cleaner.
additional_info:
Credit to Shad for most of this.

2015-12-05: Initial release. Source is probably a little messy because I mostly was just editing stuff that was already there.

2015-12-06: Softened the blue, made gradient horizontal instead of diagonal.
